items.title: national park
items.description: object which contains data about a national park and an individual species that lives in it

parkname.title: park name
parkname.description: national park name in English (excluding the "national park" part)

area_km2.title: park area
area_km2.description: park area in squared kilometers, rounded to a whole number

yearestablished.title: year established
yearestablished.description: the year in which the park got classified as 'Category II - national park' by IUCN

coordinates.title: coordinates
coordinates.description: the park's geographic coordinates in decimal degrees format

speciesid.title: species ID
speciesid.description: autogenerated species identifier, species that can be found in the park

countrycode.title: country code
countrycode.description: country in which the park is located in 2 digit ISO format

region.title: region
region.description: region(s) of the country in which the park is located, in English

website.title: website
website.description: link to the official park website
